de.bitbrain.braingdx.event

Interface GameEventFactory


  • public interface GameEventFactory
    Creates GameEvent objects.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GameEvent create(GameObject eventObject, GameObject producerObject)
      Creates an event depending on the given event object and producer object provided.
      Object[] identifiers()
      Provides an array of objects which identify as a type for a valid event object.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        GameEvent create(GameObject eventObject,
               GameObject producerObject)
        Creates an event depending on the given event object and producer object provided. The eventObject is the game object of the event, represented within the current game world as a physical entity. Additionally, the optional producerObject is the cause of this event.
        Parameters:
        eventObject - the event object
        producerObject - the cause of this event to trigger
        Returns:
        a new GameEvent object

      • identifiers

        Object[] identifiers()
        Provides an array of objects which identify as a type for a valid event object.
